summary: This document contains a Certificate of Limited Liability Company Resolutions for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, detailing the authorization for the company to open and maintain various types of accounts with the bank. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers and the responsibilities of the bank in relation to these accounts.
keyFacts: The document is a Certificate of Limited Liability Company Resolutions for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It authorizes the company to open and maintain deposit, investment advisory, and custody accounts.
The document specifies the roles and powers of Authorized Signers in managing the accounts.
It states that the bank may rely on the instructions of the Authorized Signers unless notified otherwise.
There are provisions for indemnifying the bank against claims related to actions taken by Authorized Signers.
